title: China - Tourist/Visit Visa
visa_fee: 14,000 BDT (Single Entry, Must have previous travel record to China), 17,000 BDT (Double Entry)
validity: Single or Double Entry based on application

details.title: Eligibility
items: Bangladeshi passport holders with at least 6 months passport validity from the intended date of travel.
Must have a minimum bank balance of BDT 300,000 per person maintained until passport is returned from the embassy.
Single-entry visa (14,000 BDT) is only available for applicants who have previously traveled to China.
Double-entry visa (17,000 BDT) available for eligible applicants.

details.title: Required Documents
items: Valid passport (6 months validity minimum) and all previous passports.
Two recent color photographs (48x33 mm, matte paper, white background, no cap or glasses).
Bank statement for last 6 months and solvency certificate (original with seal & signature).
Marriage certificate (if spouse's name not in passport) – must be notarized and English translated.
Confirmed return air ticket and hotel reservation.
For job holders: NOC, office ID, last 3 months' salary slips or certificate, GO for government officials, BMDC/BAR Council certificate if applicable.
For business owners: Blank official pad page, renewed trade license (English + notarized), and memorandum (for limited companies).
